original_text: Later, Apollos decided to go to the region called Achaia. The believers in Ephesus agreed that he should do that. They wrote a letter for him to give to the believers in Achaia. They wrote, ‘When Apollos arrives, please accept him.’ God had been very kind to the believers in Achaia, so that they believed in Jesus. When Apollos came to them, he helped them very much.
korean_text: 아볼로가 아가야로 건너가고자 함으로 형제들이 그를 격려하며 제자들에게 편지를 써 영접하라 하였더니 그가 가매 은혜로 말미암아 믿은 자들에게 많은 유익을 주니

sentences.original_text: Later, Apollos decided to go to the region called Achaia.
sentences.korean_translation: 나중에 아볼로는 아가야라 불리는 지역으로 가기로 결정했습니다.

sentences.original_text: The believers in Ephesus agreed that he should do that.
sentences.korean_translation: 에베소의 신자들은 그가 그렇게 해야 한다고 동의했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They wrote a letter for him to give to the believers in Achaia.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그가 아가야의 신자들에게 전달할 편지를 썼습니다.

sentences.original_text: They wrote, 'When Apollos arrives, please accept him.'
God had been very kind to the believers in Achaia,
so that they believed in Jesus.
When Apollos came to them, he helped them very much.
sentences.korean_translation: 아볼로가 그들에게 왔을 때, 그는 그들을 매우 많이 도왔습니다.
